body.p: GCC 4.1 is on its way into Portage this coming week, as the Gentoo Weekly Newsletter reports today. Official participants in Gentoo's Summer of Code will be announced later today, and the PHP team confirms that old-style PHP packages are definitely gone from the tree now. This week's edition has two reports from Gentoo events in Milan and Graz, explains how to manage your Portage overlays with a utility called layman>, spots two Gentoo developers while reviewing last week's online media, and carries the usual security announcements, bugzilla statistics, and staff news. Enjoy your newsletter!
